QuestData.Title: Sigil of Arathor
QuestData.Description: I entrusted the sigil of Arathor to Lieutenant Valorcall, leader of my cavalry. He barely escaped with his life when it was taken.$B$BIt is unlikely he will do so again. Valorcall patrols the road between Stromgarde Keep and Refuge Point. Find him, and take the sigil from him once more.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: He was one of my best, most loyal lieutenants. Oh well!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the Sigil of Arathor from Lieutenant Valorcall.
QuestData.RewardText: Valorcall was loyal to me in life. His death will not be something I bear lightly.$B$BBut bear it I must. I am Forsaken. My old existence means nothing.$B$BThe sigils are ours; Trol'kalar awaits.
